Text:
Can't get it to work. Can't find the install directory in the flash program. 

Specifically, I found the amtlib.dll file in the cracked folder, but I can't find where to put it in the application file. Please help?

@Raseth84 sorry for late reply, well if u've installed the operating system(OS) in "C" Directory then the path possibly could be this "C:Program FilesAdobeAdobe Flash CS4" just copy the .dll file in this folder...

@Raseth84 sorry for late reply, well if u've installed the operating system(OS) in "C" Directory then the path possibly could be this "C:*Program Files*Adobe*Adobe Flash CS4" replace "*" with "" just copy the .dll file in this folder...
